common.keyboardHint: Use arrow keys to navigate, ESC to close

welcome.title: Welcome to Literary Universe
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour of your dashboard to help you get started with your writing journey.

topMenu.title: Main Navigation
topMenu.content: This is your main navigation menu. Let's go through each item.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.content: Your personal homepage with activity updates, and access to your workshop, library, and social features.

discovery.title: Discovery
discovery.content: Explore stories and universes created by other users. Read behind the scenes and in-depth blog posts from the authors. Find your next favorite read!

social.title: Social
social.content: Shared joy is 10x the joy! Find groups of like minded people, join our Discord and discover who else is on Literary Universe!

scratchpad.title: Scratchpad
scratchpad.content: Scratchpad is your personal notebook that is always available for you to jot down ideas, notes, and thoughts.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.content: Stay updated with comments, follows, and other community interactions.

messages.title: Messages
messages.content: Communicate with other writers, beta readers, and collaborate on projects.

profile.title: Profile
profile.content: Manage your personal information, preferences, and account settings.

workshop.title: Workshop
workshop.content: Your creative space for writing, editing, and managing your stories and universes.

library.title: Your Library
library.content: Access all your saved stories, reading lists, and downloaded content in one place.

leftMenu.title: Quick Access Menu
leftMenu.content: This sidebar provides quick access to important features and tools.

writerEncouragement.title: Ready to Create?
writerEncouragement.content: As a writer, your Workshop is where the magic happens! Start a new story, continue writing an existing one, or build out your universe. Your readers are waiting!

readerEncouragement.title: Ready to Explore?
readerEncouragement.content: As a reader, Discovery is your gateway to amazing stories! Explore new genres, follow your favorite authors, and build your reading lists. Happy reading!
